internal.content:
Your first dance on your wedding day is romantic, personal, and unforgettable. So, of course, you need to find the perfect tune to mark the special occasion. But 
finding the right song to fill just three minutes of your entire wedding day is a tough task.

body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Your first dance on your wedding day is romantic, personal, and unforgettable. So, of course, you need to find the perfect tune to mark the special occasion. But finding the right song to fill just three minutes of your entire wedding day is a tough task.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A survey conducted by The Black Tux of over 900 married couples revealed some of the most requested first dance songs in the industry. The study revealed that \"Unchained Melody\" by The Righteous Brothers was the most popular choice, while classic love songs by Etta James, Frank Sinatra, and Elvis Presley also earned a spot on the list. More contemporary songs from artists like John Legend, Ed Sheeran, and Adele also made the top 15.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"If the top charts aren't your jam, fear not—we've also got the best selections of unique first dance wedding songs that are anything but ordinary. Whatever your taste, choose something that you and your partner will both love and cherish for years to come.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Ahead, we've rounded up the best first dance songs for your wedding.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"1. \"500 Miles,\" by Sleeping at Last","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"But I would walk five hundred miles/And I would walk five hundred more/Just to be the man who walked a thousand miles/To fall down at your door\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Ask your DJ to fade into the next song after the first minute or so if you don't want to dance to an entire song in front of everyone.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"2. \"Unchained Melody,\" by The Righteous Brothers","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"Oh, my love, my darling/I've hungered for your touch\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"3.\"Amazed,\" by Lonestar","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"I want to spend the rest of my life with you by my side/Forever and ever\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"4. \"Perfect Duet,\" by Ed Sheeran and Beyoncé","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"But darling, just kiss me slow/Your heart is all I own/And in your eyes, you're holding mine\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"5. \"All of Me,\" by John Legend","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"Give your all to me/I'll give my all to you/You're my end and my beginning\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"6. \"I Don't Want to Miss a Thing,\" by Aerosmith","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"The sweetest dream will never do/I'd still miss you, babe/And I don't want to miss a thing\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"7. \"Like I'm Gonna Lose You,\" by Jasmine Thompson","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"So I'm gonna love you/Like I'm gonna lose you/I'm gonna hold you/Like I'm saying goodbye\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"8. \"The Way You Look Tonight,\" by Frank Sinatra","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"There is nothing for me but to love you/And the way you look tonight\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"9.\"At Last,\" by Etta James","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"At last my love has come along/My lonely days are over and life is like a song, oh yeah\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"10. \"Sons and Daughters,\" by Allman Brown","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"And I, I'll wrap myself/Around your heart/I'll be the walls of his heart\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"11. \"Yours,\" by Russell Dickerson","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"I came to life when I first kissed you/The best me has his arms around you/You make me better than I was before/Thank God I'm yours\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"12. \"Kiss Me,\" by Ed Sheeran","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"And your heart's against my chest, your lips pressed in my neck/I'm falling for your eyes, but they don't know me yet/And with a feeling I'll forget, I'm in love now\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"13. \"Escapade,\" by Janet Jackson","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"Come on baby, let's get away/Let's save our troubles for another day\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"14. Sweetest Thing,\" by Allman Brown","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"You're the sweetest thing that I ever did see/Like a bird taking way/Tears that set you free\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"15. \"Speechless,\" by Dan + Shay","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lyrics of Love: \"And I'm speechless/You already know that you're my weakness/After all this time I'm just as nervous\"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}

pageContext.title: The 15 Best First Dance Songs for Your Wedding

internal.content:
In 1989 saxophonist Loren Schoenberg did a series of interviews with Mel Lewis on the history of jazz drumming. These interviews have been talked about and passed 
around for years, but now, in  the Internet age, we can get our hands on anything, any time.
Learning to play the piano is a rich and rewarding experience. Some people choose the classical route, learning Beethoven or Chopin. Others opt for famous piano songs from the realm of pop and rock.

body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Learning to play the piano is a rich and rewarding experience. Some people choose the classical route, learning Beethoven or Chopin. Others opt for famous piano songs from the realm of pop and rock.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Whichever path you choose, learning the piano can improve the capabilities of your brain. You can enjoy better problem solving and stronger communication skills.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Piano playing can even help hone academic performance.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This might not matter to you if you just want a fun hobby or to impress your friends. If that’s the case, read on to find out which ten popular piano songs you should learn to play.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"1) ‘Happy Birthday’","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This is the king of easy popular piano songs. The tune comes from a song named ‘Good morning to all’, written by sisters Patty and Mildred Hill. They used it to greet children in a Kentucky kindergarten.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The familiar lyrics were only added in 1912. Its most famous performance was that of Marilyn Monroe singing it for President John F. Kennedy in 1962.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"2) ‘Jingle Bells’","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It isn’t Christmas until someone plays Jingle Bells. Surprisingly, the song is actually about winter, not Christmas, making it a fine choice for those who get tired of the festival.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"James Lord Pierpont wrote the song in 1857. It was originally called ‘The One Horse Open Sleigh’. It wasn’t a hit when it was first performed but later grew in popularity.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Jingle Bells was also the first song broadcast from space. The astronauts on board the Gemini 6 played it at Christmas in 1965.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"3) ‘Someone Like You’","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Adele’s Someone Like You comes from her second album, 21. It has sold over half a million copies, making it the most successful single in the UK and Ireland since 2010.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Exploring a broken relationship, the song went triple platinum in the UK and quintuple platinum in the US.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Adele explained that she originally wrote the song using an acoustic guitar, only later turning to the piano.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Its simple melody makes it a favorite with students, while its lyrics make it a firm favorite with singers everywhere.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"4) ‘Für Elise’","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Beethoven is a popular favorite for piano students because his music is so recognizable. Für Elise is actually called Bagatelle in A Minor but few would know that name.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It’s a more substantial piece so it’s not ideal for absolute beginners. But for those of you who want to stretch your playing wings, it’s a perfect choice.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The score was actually published in 1867, 40 years after Beethoven’s death. No one knows who ‘Elise’ was. Some believe the name was mis-transcribed and it should be Für Therese, named for a former friend of the composer.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"5) ‘The Entertainer – A Ragtime Two-Step’","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Scott Joplin’s 1902 melody is definitely one of the most popular piano songs. Published in 1902, it was originally sold as sheet music before being used in player pianos.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It’s more famous for its use in the 1973 film, The Sting. The film was set in the 1930s, though ragtime’s popularity ended a generation earlier. The Sting also helped audiences to rediscover Joplin’s work, as well as ragtime.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The song is now commonly played by ice cream trucks.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"6) ‘Rondo Alla Turca’","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Otherwise known as Piano Sonata No.11, Mozart’s Rondo Alla Turca is a piano student classic. Scholars believe Mozart wrote the sonata in 1783.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Its name means ‘The Turkish March’ because it emulates Turkish Janissary bands. These bands were popular during the eighteenth century.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The melody is played several times on the town radio station throughout the 1998 film, The Truman Show. It also appears in other films, such as the BBC’s 1995 adaptation of Pride and Prejudice.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"7) ‘A Thousand Miles’","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A Thousand Miles was Vanessa Carlton’s international debut. She reached the top ten in many charts, yet despite receiving three Grammy nominations, the song didn’t pick up any awards.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The song was first played during a scene in the 2001 film, Legally Blonde.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Vanessa Carlton didn’t become a household name but through the popularity of the song on the radio, A Thousand Miles has become one of the more famous modern piano songs.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"8) ‘Clair de Lune’","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Debussy’s Clair de Lune often appears on compilations of music to aid sleep. It’s not surprising since the piece is so restful.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The third movement of Suite bergamasque, its name means ‘Moonlight’.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Debussy first composed the suite in 1890, but didn’t publish it until 1905. Sadly he grew to hate these pieces by the time he reached publication.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"9) ‘Imagine’","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"No list of famous piano songs is complete without John Lennon’s Imagine. The anti-war anthem is touching but its melody is easy to master.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Recorded in 1971, Lennon co-produced the song with legendary producer Phil Spector. The song has sold 1.6 million copies in the UK alone.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The song finally reached no.1 in the UK chart after Lennon’s murder in 1980. Liverpool’s John Lennon Airport adopted the line “Above us only sky” as their slogan.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It’s also famous for being the song played before the ball drops in Times Square on New Year’s Eve.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"10) ‘Piano Man’","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Billy Joel’s hit was made for a list of popular piano songs. Piano Man was Joel’s first single, released in 1973. It has since become his ‘signature’ song.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The lyrics explore Joel’s experiences as a singer in a piano lounge in the early 1970s. The characters in the song are based on people he encountered at the lounge.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"At 5 minutes and 38 seconds, it was originally deemed too long when it was released. Later edits saw the running time reduced, something Joel referred to in his song, The Entertainer.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Piano Man is now a beloved piano favorite. It was even selected for preservation by the Library of Congress in 2016.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":" ","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}

prev.title: Top 10 Popular Piano Songs For Beginners
